page.title: 17 Great Missenden Police
page.content: Great Missenden police operate from a police office;there are four policemen who patrol our area. The villages they patrol are Holmer Green, Little Kingshill,Prestwood and Great Missenden. The police office is very small. It contains one table,six chairs,a kettle,cups,four flat hats and four helmets. They use Ford Escort cars and BMW motorbikes. They also use police Escort vans for carrying police dogs. At Great Missenden there are three constables and one sergeant. They have to be a certain height which is at least 5'8" and for women it is 5'6". The most commonly reported crime in the area is burglary.The most likely time for burglaries to take place is in the afternoon,particularly during fine weather.
